answers.answer: Hi there! It's normal to itch on your palms and feet due to hormones. I had it and almost like a burning itch. I got diagnosed with gestational diabetes so make sure you consult your dr with this to find out what the problem is. But I used Google and freaked myself out thinking it was liver related to! Don't worry about it until you talk to dr and have a diagnosis! Best of luck momma!
You're probably just starting to get fluid build up. Try massage or wearing compression socks, both really work well for my swelling and itchiness.

question: I am currently 27w2days, ftm. Since the last few days i have noticed that my palm and feet has been itching. It isnt severe or something that makes me uncomfortable. But definitely its noticable. I did some googling and it says could be a liver issue. And now i am scared. My doctors appontment is on 1st August.It would be great help if anyone could shared your experience or had any tips. I am really hoping that my liver is not the issue.  :(
title: Itchy palm and feet.. please help
